alert.note: Alert for Wind River Basin (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued January 11 at 7:08AM MST until January 11 at 5:00PM MST by NWS Riverton
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING IN EFFECT UNTIL 5 PM MST THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Heavy snow. Additional snow accumulations of 2 to 5 inches. * WHERE...Wind River Basin. * WHEN...Until 5 PM MST this afternoon. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions will impact the morning and evening commute. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Periods of intense snowfall rates are likely throughout the morning. Reports of slick roads with high impact to travel have been received this morning.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
